message: Let's start with a fair deal.  You get 10% and I get 90%.
Let's meet in the middle, 60-40 is a fair deal.
I'm willing to compromise, but 7200-2800 is my final offer.  I'm losing more value with each round.
I'll give you a bit more, but I still think 55-45 is more than fair, considering the inflation is affecting you more.
